target.rawSql:
SELECT
  id,
  start_time as startTime,
  end_time as endTime,
  'Boundary Node Deployment' as title,
  CONCAT('Nodes: ', hostnames, ' | ', 'Status: ', status) as text,
  CONCAT(environment, ',', hostnames, ',', status) as tags
FROM annotations.boundary_node_deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND environment = ${env}
  AND status = 'started'
  AND ${show_deployments} = '1'

SELECT
  id,
  start_time as startTime,
  end_time as endTime,
  'Boundary Node Deployment' as title,
  CONCAT('Nodes: ', hostnames, ' | ', 'Status: ', status) as text,
  CONCAT(environment, ',', hostnames, ',', status) as tags
FROM annotations.boundary_node_deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND environment = ${env}
  AND status = 'failed'
  AND ${show_deployments} = '1'

SELECT
  id,
  start_time as startTime,
  end_time as endTime,
  'Boundary Node Deployment' as title,
  CONCAT('Nodes: ', hostnames, ' | ', 'Status: ', status) as text,
  CONCAT(environment, ',', hostnames, ',', status) as tags
FROM annotations.boundary_node_deployments
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(start_time)
  AND environment = ${env}
  AND status = 'complete'
  AND ${show_deployments} = '1'

description: Prometheus metrics of the ic-boundary reverse-proxy
